snippet: The proposed rules on federal aid need to be tightened to protect more students from programs that sell a mix of crushing debt and useless credentials.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Obama administration's proposed rules for dealing with predatory for-profit colleges; warns rules will need to be strengthened to fully protect students and taxpayers from the schools, which rely on federal student aid for up to 90 percent of their revenue.
lead_paragraph: The proposed rules on federal aid need to be tightened to protect more students from programs that sell a mix of crushing debt and useless credentials.
